item.title: Welcome
item.description:
About a guy…

Hi there. This is the first (and maybe last) post I’ll write on my website. Don’t worry, I’m not crossing any rivers soon—at least, I don’t plan to—but I know how erratic my interests can be, so this website might just be another short-lived passion.

The reason I decided to build this website is simple: if you work in the data field, you need a place to showcase your work to increase your chances of getting hired. It took me a while to accept this, but here we are1.
